players = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/nfl-big-data-bowl-2022/players.csv')

source.60152ad4:
from autoviz.AutoViz_Class import AutoViz_Class
AV = AutoViz_Class()
source.f591633b:
filename = "/kaggle/input/nfl-big-data-bowl-2022/players.csv"
sep = ","
dft = AV.AutoViz(
    filename,
    sep=",",
    depVar="",
    dfte=None,
    header=0,
    verbose=0,
    lowess=False,
    chart_format="svg"
)

    filename,

source.441cd374:
#### AutoViz is a one-click visualization engine: It creates powerful charts that anyone from a beginner to an expert can use.
#### It Automatically Visualize any dataset, any size with a single line of code.

#### AutoViz performs automatic visualization of any dataset with one line. Give any input file (CSV, txt or json) and AutoViz will visualize it.
